fields.desc: Backend type.
fields.name: type

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this ACL provider
fields.name: enable

fields.desc:
Path to the file which contains the ACL rules.
If the file provisioned before starting EMQX node,
it can be placed anywhere as long as EMQX has read access to it.
That is, EMQX will treat it as read only.

In case the rule-set is created or updated from EMQX Dashboard or HTTP API,
a new file will be created and placed in `authz` subdirectory inside EMQX's `data_dir`,
and the old file will not be used anymore.
fields.name: path

desc: Authorization using an external HTTP server (via GET requests).

fields.desc: Backend type.
fields.name: type

fields.name: enable

fields.desc: URL of the auth server.

fields.desc: HTTP request timeout.
fields.name: request_timeout

fields.desc: HTTP request body.
fields.name: body

fields.desc: The timeout when connecting to the HTTP server.
fields.name: connect_timeout

fields.desc: A positive integer. Whether to send HTTP requests continuously, when set to 1, it means that after each HTTP request is sent, you need to wait for the server to return and then continue to send the next request.
fields.name: enable_pipelining

fields.desc: Deprecated since 5.0.4.
fields.name: max_retries

fields.desc: The pool size.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: Configure HTTP request parameters.
fields.name: request

fields.desc: Deprecated since 5.0.4.
fields.name: retry_interval

fields.desc: SSL connection settings.
fields.name: ssl

fields.desc: HTTP method.
fields.name: method

fields.desc: List of HTTP headers (without content-type).
fields.name: headers

desc: Authorization using a MongoDB replica set.

fields.desc: Backend type.
fields.name: type

fields.desc: Set to true or false to disable this ACL provider
fields.name: enable

fields.desc: `MongoDB` collection containing the authorization data.
fields.name: collection

fields.desc:
Conditional expression that defines the filter condition in the query. Filter supports the following placeholders
- ${username}: Will be replaced at runtime with Username used by the client when connecting
- ${clientid}: Will be replaced at runtime with Client ID used by the client when connecting
fields.name: filter

fields.desc: Replica set. Must be set to 'rs' when MongoDB server is running in 'replica set' mode.
fields.name: mongo_type

fields.desc:
A Node list for Cluster to connect to. The nodes should be separated with commas, such as: `Node[,Node].`
For each Node should be: The IPv4 or IPv6 address or the hostname to connect to.
A host entry has the following form: `Host[:Port]`.
The MongoDB default port 27017 is used if `[:Port]` is not specified.
fields.name: servers

fields.desc: Write mode.
fields.name: w_mode

fields.desc: Read mode.
fields.name: r_mode

fields.desc: Name of the replica set.
fields.name: replica_set_name

fields.desc: Use DNS SRV record.
fields.name: srv_record

fields.desc: Size of the connection pool towards the bridge target service.
fields.name: pool_size

fields.desc: EMQX's username in the external database.
fields.name: username

fields.desc: EMQX's password in the external database.
fields.name: password

fields.desc: Database name associated with the user's credentials.
fields.name: auth_source

fields.desc: Database name.
fields.name: database

fields.desc: SSL connection settings.
fields.name: ssl
